bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Test Code for Dry-Type Distribution and Power Transformers
Redline
IEEE Standard Test Code for Dry-Type Distribution and Power Transformers - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.12.91-2011 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.91-2001) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This revision addresses substantive changes to Clause 5, 10 and 11 This revision addresses substantive changes to Clause 5, Clause 10, and Clause 11 of IEEE Std C57.12.91-2001 to reflect current practice in the testing procedures of dry-type transformers. This revision does not address transformer requirements and specific test criteria; rather they are contained in appropriate standards such as IEEE Std C57.12.01 or in user specifications.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
